meanings.sent1: The biocenoses in the forest work together to maintain a balanced ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the biocenoses in the ocean to understand marine life better.
meanings.sent3: The biocenoses at the park picnic seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The biocenoses in the garden danced harmoniously to the rhythm of nature.
meanings.sent5: The biocenoses in the pond created a beautiful symphony of life.

meanings.definition: The living organisms in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The biocenoses near the river include fish, plants, and insects.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the biocenoses of the rainforest revealed a diverse array of species.
meanings.sent3: The biocenoses in the backyard seemed to be having a neighborhood meeting.
meanings.sent4: The biocenoses of the desert adapted to the harsh conditions over time.
meanings.sent5: The biocenoses in the meadow painted a colorful canvas of life.
